CustomField.description: This is used to calculate commissions. Other date math formulas were not used since they cannot handle partial months.
CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Contract_SKU__r.SKU_Product__r.Product_Type__c) = "Add-On", ADDMONTHS(Contract_Effective_Date__c, 6) >= Effective_Date__c, IF( ADDMONTHS(Opportunity_Close_Date__c, 6) >= Effective_Date__c, TRUE, FALSE ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Compared with the Subscription Contract's Effective Date.
CustomField.label: Under 6 Months?
